H0.text: What animal is traditionally seen in the branding of Fox's Glacier Mints. Polar Bear

H1.text: What animal is traditionally seen in the branding of Fox's Glacier Mints. Penguin

H2.text: What animal is traditionally seen in the branding of Fox's Glacier Mints. Arctic Fox

H3.text: What animal is traditionally seen in the branding of Fox's Glacier Mints. Icebear

A4.text: Since 1922, the mints have been branded with Peppy the polar bear, who was designed by Clarence Reginald Dalby.

A5.text: Peppy is typically depicted as though standing on one of the mints.
